main event: An unidentified flying object was photographed in Norton, Kansas on February 12, 1948.
interesting points: The report contains 4 photographs of the event., One photograph shows a meteor trail taken by an amateur photographer., The meteor appeared to break into smaller fragments while it was visible., Another photograph features a bright unidentified object, attributed to photographer Al Asnis., The report does not mention any authorities being contacted regarding the sightings.
sighted object: unidentified flying object and meteor trail
witness description: amateur photographer residing about 25 miles north and 5 miles east of Norton.
